name: PuzzleScript with two players
description:
If you played Conveyor Confusion (It's a great game, you should check it out), you probably read that sftrabbit has put a lot of work assembling the whole game. On Februrary 28, I decided to ask him if he could implement 2-player control in PuzzleScript. He did so I tested it, seems to work like intended !

The "fork" is still very basic, but I could make a game using that.

If you want to mess with it, here is the link :
https://sftrabbit.github.io/PuzzleScript-2Player/editor.html

So sftrabbit didn't updated the standalone, so you have to use the link to see that the game works propely, I'll make a devlog if it's fixed.
